snippet: A man hospitalized in Indiana with the first U.S. case of a mysterious virus that has sickened hundreds in the Middle East is improving, state health officials said Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Indiana Health Officials: MERS Patient Improving
headline.main: Indiana Health Officials: MERS Patient Improving

lead_paragraph: A man hospitalized in Indiana with the first U.S. case of a mysterious virus that has sickened hundreds in the Middle East is improving, state health officials said Saturday.
